description:
Create a strongly-typed IPC communication facade using TypeScript interfaces and code generation. Implement contract-first approach where both Angular and Electron processes share type definitions for all inter-process messages.

**Rationale:** IPC communication in Electron apps is typically strung-typed and error-prone. Type-safe IPC prevents runtime errors, improves developer experience with autocomplete, and serves as living documentation of the communication contract between processes.
title: Add IPC Type-Safe Communication Layer
